column4: could anyone tell me a good software to share a internet connection for 2 computers
i dont have money for a router and i do have 2 eth
: it's called ip masq or ip forwarding, its not a program but a feature built into linux: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=91370
did you try that link i sent you?   thats how I got my internet between 2 ethernet ubuntu boxes
